name: Sun Eater
description:
The Game

As a living sun eater dreadnought your buffet is interrupted by some lone fighter who went through your drones to try and prevent you from eating their world's sun, such impudence ! It's time to teach them their last lesson.

The Jam

Made in Unity for the Technically a Game Jam 2022, the theme was :

This game follows this as a game that's Like a Bullet-Hell, but you're the Boss.

Controls ActionKeyboard & MouseGamepadMoveWASD/ZQSDLeft StickAimMouseRight Stick
Spraying AutogunLeft ClickRight TriggerCardinal Rosace BlasterRight ClickLeft TriggerEnergy Disks (Hold to preview)FLeft ShoulderTachyon Lances (Hold to preview)SpaceRight ShoulderPauseEscape/EnterStart 3rd party stuff

Component Spaceship with Compatible Wings and Parts

Massive Weapon Package

200+ Space Sound Effects (Various Futuristic SFX)

Explosion Animations Pack

Parallax Space Backgrounds

33 Game Background Music (Infinite Loops)

i really can't do art & sounds, gotta start getting into teams for game jams at some point instead of relying on 3rd party assets.
